text: The General Zionists (, translit. HaTzionim HaKlaliym) were a centrist Zionist movement and a political party in Israel. The General Zionists supported the leadership of Chaim Weizmann. Their political ideas are similar to the modern- day Likud. ==References== Category:1920s establishments in Israel Category:1960s disestablishments in Asia Category:Former political parties in Israel Category:Zionist parties
title: General Zionists
